pr_title: fix: Restrict access to the METADATASTORE namespace

timeline.message:
fix: Restrict access to the METADATASTORE namespace

Add feature for admin user/ user with "ALL" authority to be able to read METADATASTORE namespace

Signed-off-by: Morten Svanaes <msvanaes@dhis2.org>

timeline.author: stian-sandvold

timeline.bodyText: Should we either remove this or remove the commenting? Is the method not used?
timeline.author: larshelge

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/dhis-2/dhis-api/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/keyjsonvalue/KeyJsonValueService.java b/dhis-2/dhis-api/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/keyjsonvalue/KeyJsonValueService.java
index 788749535e..309878dc4c 100644
--- a/dhis-2/dhis-api/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/keyjsonvalue/KeyJsonValueService.java
+++ b/dhis-2/dhis-api/src/main/java/org/hisp/dhis/keyjsonvalue/KeyJsonValueService.java

@@ -43,14 +43,6 @@ public interface KeyJsonValueService
      */
     List<String> getNamespaces( boolean isAdmin );
 
-//    /**
-//     * Retrieves a list of keys from a namespace.
-//     *
-//     * @param namespace the namespace to retrieve keys from.
-//     * @return a list of strings representing the keys from the namespace.
-//     */
-//    List<String> getKeysInNamespace( String namespace, boolean isAdmin );
-
     /**
      * Retrieves list of KeyJsonValue objects belonging to the specified namespace.
      *

timeline.bodyText: Use ternary operator for more compact code.
timeline.author: larshelge
